channel.title: Borderlands
channel.description:
Only recently heard about it a month or so ago but it really looks amazing, it's a 4 player co-op RPG-shooter made by Gearbox software.
Trailer [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CdBFWti6mkg[/url]
Gameplay [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MadJGL7vtgk[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7CwOUJ7Xn9U[/url]
I'll be getting this one, comes out October 30th for PC users.

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
Yeah, I reckon i’m going to pre-order this one.

Read full topic

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: Bigspfan
item.description:
I would really like to play this game, recently on twitter the head dev said that if you preordered and sent him a picture via e-mail. He would play with you on launch day and drop some “sweet loot”. But seeing as how Brian Crecente “editor in chief” of Kotaku announced this news publicly he’s had so many people send him e-mails he’s started to say that he can no longer follow through with any more people wanting in on the sweet deal. If it’s playable through steam I’d be up to play with anyone not before I play Brutal Legend to death first, of course.

Read full topic

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
How can you let yourself get upset about little numbers? I find that to be a feature, to know how much damage you’re doing. It shouldn’t be too hard to disable it either, should it?

Either way, you fail at stoicism.

I like the graphic style as it portrays a good level of detail, and I have some light fondness for the universe as it’s a more realistic approach to fantasy. I hope Gearbox does well with the title, but I never expect the chance to play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
This looks like it would get dull rather quickly. Plus all of the numbers flying out of people seems to get annoying rather quickly.

Read full topic

Played it last weekend, and it’s awesome.

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
It always struck me as a poor-mans version of Rage. Much more excited to see that game.

Read full topic

item.title: Borderlands
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
It’s not cell shaded… it just has thick black outlines on things… which gives it a kind of pseudo-cartoon effect whilst retaining texture detail.
